modName: How to prepare nif file to import into Skyrim
summary: How to prepare nif file to import into Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This is my tutorial showing how to prepare nif file to import into Skyrim. Only simple models, not for: armors, helmets, bodies etc.
It is about only meshes, not about animations. Also there is not about collisions. Collisions in next tutorial.

Archive contains:
- guidebook in pdf file
- video tutorial in mkv file
- \"Test file.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s exported model from \"Test file.max\" (before editing in NifSkope)
- \"Test model.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s exported and edited in NifSkope model (as base/original not from game file, this file can be used as \"mother\" for your completely new models)
- \"Model to import into Skyrim.nif\" as file for testing - it\'s edited in NifSkope model from \"Test file.nif\" (ready to import into Skyrim), contains textures

You may also watch my video tutorial on YouTube.

How to import nif file to 3dsMax - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11642
How to export nif file from 3ds Max - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11677
How to make collision in nif file - Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11884
author: starjacker0
